title: Looking for someone who is willing to be trained to play zilean top
body:
our team is in need of someone who can play with our team and cooperate with the strategy that the team is based around.

If you want to do your own thing do not add me.

ign: whitepumah

replies.body: What happens when one of your champs gets banned or picked?
Zilean and Shaco stealth bombs ftw!
